encyclopedia.content: newcastle是地名，同名的有英国纽卡斯尔市、澳大利亚纽卡斯尔市、加拿大新不伦瑞克省纽卡斯尔市、美国宾夕法尼亚州纽卡斯尔市、南非纳塔尔省纽卡斯尔市、美国特拉华州纳纽卡斯尔市。

means.word_mean: 1. a port city in northeastern England on the River Tyne; a center for coal exports (giving rise to the expression `carry coals to Newcastle' meaning to do something unnecessary)
